ranking: yo : CLI tool for running Yeoman generators
yo : CLI tool for running Yeoman generators
yeoman-generator : Rails-inspired generator system that provides scaffolding for your apps

generate : Command line tool and developer framework for scaffolding out new GitHub projects. Generate offers the robustness and configurability of Yeoman, the expressiveness and simplicity of Slush, and more powerful flow control and composability than either.
yeoman-environment : Handles the lifecyle and bootstrapping of generators in a specific environment
